page.description: Class for creating snapshots of databases.

property.name: CallResult
property.description: An object with properties that describe the result of each call to a function of SQL::DatabaseSnapshot. When the function returns false, you can get more complete information concerning the results using the CallResult property.

property.name: Name
property.description: The unique name of the snapshot to be used if the snapshot is included in a collection of snapshots.

property.name: Schema
property.description: An object that manages the table definitions in the snapshot and the relationships between them. The schema is able to generate the scripts to drop and create tables and to be sure that tables are dropped and added in the right order, accounting for dependencies between them.

property.name: Table
property.description: A collection of SQL::TableSnapshot objects that each contains the definition and data for a specific table.

property.name: XML
property.description: The persisted XML string that describes the snapshot
